They are assigned automatically according to the title and role the employee is performing.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Every training course on the Onboarding Portal has deadlines. Deadlines are meant to provide a guideline for completing the assigned training course, it is highly recommended that you observe the deadlines. This will help to keep abreast of any changes.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When an engineer joins End-User Services, apart from the standard list of training courses, specific training courses that are essential for work are assigned. It is highly recommended that EUS engineers complete these courses as soon as possible.
